    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.sn_sdlc_BoardManager</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>sn_sdlc_BoardManager</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var sn_sdlc_BoardManager = Class.create();
sn_sdlc_BoardManager.prototype = {

    addUserToVtb: function (boardSysId, userSysId) {
        if (!boardSysId || !userSysId)
            return;

        var member = new GlideRecord("vtb_board_member");
        member.addQuery("board", boardSysId);
        member.addQuery("user" , userSysId);
        member.query();

        // Insert if member does not exist.
        if (!member.next()) {
            member.setValue("board", boardSysId);
            member.setValue("user" , userSysId);
            member.insert();
        }
    },

    addTeamMembersToVtb: function (boardSysId, sprint) {
        var scrumTeamMembers = new GlideRecord("sys_user_grmember");
        scrumTeamMembers.addQuery('group', sprint.getValue('assignment_group'));
        scrumTeamMembers.query();

        while (scrumTeamMembers.next()) {
            this.addUserToVtb(boardSysId, scrumTeamMembers.getValue("name"));
        }
    },

    updateVtbForSprint: function(sprint) {
        var boardSysId = null;
        boardSysId = this.getExistingBoardId(sprint);
        if(!boardSysId) {
            var vtbBoard = GlideVTBBoardBuilder.guided("rm_story", "state")
                                .withFilter("sprint=" + sprint.getValue("sys_id"))
                                .withName(sprint.getValue("short_description"))
                                .withOwner(gs.getUserID());
            boardSysId = vtbBoard.create();
        }
        // Add team members as VTB members
        this.addTeamMembersToVtb(boardSysId, sprint);
        return boardSysId;
    },

    getExistingBoardId:function(sprint){
        var boardSysId = null;
        var filter=null;
        var board = new GlideRecord("vtb_board");
        board.addQuery('name' ,sprint.getValue("short_description"));
        board.addQuery('table', 'rm_story');
        board.addQuery('field', 'state');
        filter = "sprint=" + sprint.getValue("sys_id");
        board.addQuery('filter',filter);
        board.query();
        if(board.next()){
            boardSysId = board.getValue('sys_id');
        }
        return boardSysId;
    },

    type: 'sn_sdlc_BoardManager'
}]]></script>
